/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and trees, adding depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue sky and the gray and white hues of the buildings.
